name: Preservation Qualities
description: Preservation and recovery qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: SECOND WIND
qualities.description:
When **Initiative** is rolled, the Digimon gains uses of this Quality equal to its **Ranks**.

The Digimon can make a **Recovery Check** as 1 **Action**, but only **once per turn** and it cannot **Attack** the same turn it uses this Quality.

It loses all unexpended uses when Combat ends, but regains extra **Wound Boxes** when making a **Recovery Check** at the end of Combat for each unexpended use.

qualities.name: VITAL ENERGY RANK 1
qualities.description: **Once per round** (which resets at the end of the Digimon's turns), the Digimon may reroll any 1's that appear when making a **Health Check**.

qualities.name: VITAL ENERGY RANK 2
qualities.description: **Once per round** (which resets at the end of the Digimon's turns), the Digimon may reroll any 1's and 2's that appear when making a **Health Check**.

qualities.name: PACK MASTER
qualities.description: If the Digimon would be targeted by an **Attack**, an adjacent **Ally** may **Intercede** as a **Free Action once per Round**.

qualities.name: TUMBLER
qualities.description:
The Digimon gains bonus **Damage** reduction equal to its **RAM** when taking **Crash Damage**.

If the Digimon also possesses the **EXTRA MOVE: JUMPER** Quality, it negates all **Crash Damage** from falling.
